transformation_logic: case(upcase(disposition_term)) when('COMPLETED STUDY') then 'COMPLETED' when('ADVERSE EVENT','WITHDREW DUE TO AE') then 'ADVERSE EVENT' when('WITHDREW CONSENT','SUBJECT WITHDREW') then 'WITHDRAWAL BY SUBJECT' when('LOST TO FOLLOW UP') then 'LOST TO FOLLOW-UP' when('DEATH','DIED') then 'DEATH' when('PROTOCOL VIOLATION') then 'PROTOCOL DEVIATION' when('SCREEN FAILURE') then 'SCREEN FAILURE' else 'OTHER' end
comments: Standardized disposition code per CDISC CT
Fixed category for all DS records

transformation_logic: case(upcase(visit_name)) when('SCREENING','SCREEN') then 'SCREENING' when('TREATMENT','BASELINE','WEEK 1','WEEK 4','WEEK 8') then 'TREATMENT' when('FOLLOW-UP','FU') then 'FOLLOW-UP' else 'OTHER' end

case(upcase(visit_name)) when('SCREENING','SCREEN') then 'SCREENING' when('TREATMENT','BASELINE','WEEK 1','WEEK 4','WEEK 8') then 'TREATMENT' when('FOLLOW-UP','FU') then 'FOLLOW-UP' else 'NOT ASSIGNED' end

comments: Date of disposition event (same as DSSTDTC for point events)

transformation_logic: if DSSTDTC ne '' and RFSTDTC ne '' then DSSTDY=input(DSSTDTC,yymmdd10.)-input(RFSTDTC,yymmdd10.)+1*(input(DSSTDTC,yymmdd10.)>=input(RFSTDTC,yymmdd10.))
comments: Study day calculation from reference start date
